entry.summary:

Type: T-SHIRT
Price: 4700.00

Description

The White Mammoth T-Shirt is the energy of the TRAV-AGE that transforms every moment into a statement. The mammoth graphic represents an irrepressible presence, riding sublime basslines and concert vibrations that make you feel you are being swept away by the crowd. It is not just a print--it is a motion, the size and the force of the performance.

Made of high-quality heavyweight cotton, the oversized concert tee is designed with a round neck fit, drop-shoulder, and structured fit, which has breathable comfort and a longer-lasting fit. The mammoth graphic is emphasised with the help of the clean white canvas and making it bold.

Make it street style with layered clothes, ripped or cargos to make it festival ready, stage to street.

Description

This white flight mode t-shirt boasts a dynamic design, featuring a bird in motion. With its sleek appearance and bird motif, this t-shirt is perfect for those who are constantly on the move. 

WITH A ROUND NECK AND SHORT SLEEVES, IT FEATURES A HIGH-DENSITY PRINT AND A BOLD, WELL-CURATED COLOR PALETTE, MAKING IT AN ESSENTIAL PIECE FOR THOSE WHO LOVE TO STAND OUT.

Reverse Wash only
